content.question: Following a prolonged power outage, the price of flashlights normally increases significantly. If cities had passed laws prohibiting price increases for flashlights, during power outages such laws would most likely

choices.label: shift the demand curve for flashlights to the right
shift the supply curve for flashlights to the left
have no effect on the availability of flashlights

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
